title: Rename app to Study Calculator

requirements.text: Rename the application to 'Study Calculator' — update the branded header title in App.tsx and any other visible instances of the app name (page title in index.html, any footer or metadata references) to display 'Study Calculator'.

quotes: Study Calculator uska name rakh do

acceptanceCriteria: The header in the app displays 'Study Calculator' as the app name.
The browser tab title (index.html <title>) reads 'Study Calculator'.
No other instances of a different app name remain visible in the UI.

constraints: Do not change any calculator functionality, logic, or visual design — only the app name/branding should be updated.
nonGoals: Changing the calculator UI layout or theme.
Adding new calculator features or operations.
